key.name: color-scheme
key.description: The name of a GtkSouceView theme to use to style the text area

key.name: auto-indent
key.description: When enabled Ennio will attemp to indent code automatically

key.name: indent-width
key.description: Specifies the number of spaces that should be displayed instead of Tab characters.

key.name: highlight-current-line
key.description: When enabled Ennio will highlight the current line

key.name: show-right-margin
key.description: Display a vertical bar 80 charecters accross Helps with languages such as Python where it's good practice to keep lines less than 80 charecters long

key.name: spaces-instead-of-tabs
key.description: Whether should replace tabs with spaces

key.name: show-line-numbers
key.description: Show line numbers down the left of the screen

key.name: indent-on-tab
key.description: When multiple lines are selected indent them using the tab key
